detaileddescription.para: Section: Visualization Toolkit Geo Vis Classes

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: vtkGeoInteractorStyle contains interaction capabilities for a geographic view including orbit, zoom, and tilt. It also includes a compass widget for changing view parameters.
To create an instance of class vtkGeoInteractorStyle, simply invoke its constructor as follows obj = vtkGeoInteractorStyle

sect1.title: Methods
sect1.para:
The class vtkGeoInteractorStyle has several methods that can be used. They are listed below. Note that the documentation is translated automatically from the VTK sources, and may not be completely intelligible. When in doubt, consult the VTK website.
